item.description:
Sunday, December 4th Paws in the Park committee meeting

 6 p.m. Panera Bread Deming Street


We will be planning out our 6th annual Paws in the Park including going over vendor and sponsorship packages, contests, attractions, auctions, publicity and more.  This years event will be on Saturday, May 5th at Nevers Park in South Windsor. Last year we raised over $4,500 for the Fidelco Guide Dog Foundation and South Windsor Bark Park.  Anyone that wishes to be a part of the committee is encouraged to attend.  This will be the only planning meeting for Paws until late March. If you can not attend and wish to help on the committee or have suggestions please contact Paul prior to the meeting at pawsintheparksw@aol.com
item.name: Paws in the Park committee meeting
